pageProduct.name: Pediasure Ready To Drink Vanilla Fibre 220ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

PediaSure Fibre is suitable for children aged 1-10 years:
•whose patterns of growth are below those of their age group
•whose caloric and nutrient requirements are increased due to a medical condition
•who are undernourished or have decreased food intake due to illness or diminished appetite

Warnings

Food for Special Medical Purposes. This product is suitable as a supplement source of nutrition. Use only under medical supervision.

Not for Parenteral use

Not for use in children with galactosaemia

Common Uses

PediaSure Fibre ready to drink is specially formulated to help fill nutritional gaps in children aged 1-10 years with added fibre.

Ingredients

Complete, balanced nutrition with 28 essential vitamins and minerals including iron, zinc, calcium and vitamin D

Fibre-enriched

Directions

Suggested 2 serves daily for 1- 8 year olds and 2-3 serves for 9-10 year olds
